name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 30, Xi Jinping accepted the credentials of the new Afghan Taliban ambassador to China at the Great Hall of the People.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of January 31, a fire broke out in Dongshan No. 1, Guiyang City, due to fireworks. The owner called 119 and immediately started self-rescue, but found that the interface between the fire hydrant and the water pipe in the corridor could not be connected.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 31, workers at Shenzhen Pinghu Shifangli blocked the entrance of the shopping mall and sat on the ground to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 31, the A-share market fell for three consecutive days and fell below 2,800 points again, wiping out last week's gains. The relevant comment area once again staged an awakening contest.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 31, a parent reported under his real name that a teacher at No. 28 Middle School in the High-tech Zone of Linyi City, Shandong Province, beat his child for three hours and asked the student to kneel down. The parent called the teacher to question him, but the teacher responded, "Did I beat your child to death?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 30, according to Cailianshe, Suzhou was rumored to have completely lifted the purchase restrictions, and the area and number of houses purchased were no longer restricted. The reporter called the Suzhou Housing and Urban-Rural Development Bureau, and the staff said that there would be no qualification review for the purchase of new and second-hand houses, and the new house sales restriction policy would still be two years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 30, a boy was beaten by a group of people with sticks and belts at the gate of Shangcheng Dongjun Community in Anyang, Henan Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the follow-up of the Dongshan No. 1 fire in Guiyang, a man said that his mother died in the fire. At the same time, he pointed out that the fire hydrants in the corridor were all stuck with screws and could not be opened.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 30, a company in Jiangsu received a "Notice of Return of Rewards" and was required to return the previous government subsidy of 24 million yuan.
The notice stated that the two reward funds received by the company in March 2023 and June 2023 did not comply with relevant policies. In order to regulate fiscal expenditure behavior, the company should remit the above two reward funds to its designated account before February 29, 2024.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 31, a blogger "maliciously recalled" an article in the People's Daily in 2016: China is expected to enter a high-income stage starting in 2024.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 31 marked the fourth anniversary of Li Wenliang’s post on Weibo announcing that he was reprimanded for revealing pneumonia cases. Netizens left messages in the comment section to mourn him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 28, Shanghai. An old man complained on the subway that the English translation in the subway car was written in Chinglish, "just like the level of the Chinese national football team."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
But now it seems that the article is not wrong. Because the article of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences clearly pointed out that as long as there are no subversive mistakes in politics, no devastating blows in the economy, and no fault-like fluctuations in the system, a well-off society will be fully built in 2024. ​​​
We just took some detours.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: That afternoon, the village had been reduced to ruins.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Gradually going crazy

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/KKposl3THk

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: But in the end, I still hope that everyone will be careful with what they say and do. Throughout history, whenever the stock market crashes, people are arrested for making outrageous remarks.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 31, migrant workers in Linyi County, Yuncheng City, Shanxi Province, knelt down at the Petition Bureau and shouted "Long live the Communist Party" to demand their wages. They then placed wreaths at the sales office of the property that owed them wages to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 31, the national cybersecurity and informatization system reported on its work in 2023.
In 2023, 10,646 websites were interviewed, 14,624 website registrations were revoked, and 453 websites were ordered to suspend functions or update. 259 apps and 119 mini-programs were removed from the shelves. 127,878 accounts were blocked by order.
Almost all mainstream Internet applications have been fined for "presenting information content prohibited by laws and regulations from being published or transmitted" and "causing bloody violence, false information, incitement to confrontation and other negative information to be spread online."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 31, as the stock market plummeted, investors responded with “good, good, good” in unison under the news that “Xi Jinping chaired a Politburo meeting”.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the Nanchang Municipal Bureau of Culture, Radio, Television, Press, Publication and Tourism issued a notice requiring Internet cafes to be prohibited from operating all night.
